alert.note: Alert for Juab; Millard; Sanpete (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 4:50PM MDT until April 16 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sanpete County in central Utah... Eastern Millard County in central Utah... Southeastern Juab County in central Utah... * Until 515 PM MDT * At 449 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Scipio, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manti, Moroni, Scipio, Ephraim, Gunnison, Mount Pleasant, Wales, Fayette, Centerfield, Fountain Green, Spring City, Levan, Mayfield, Sterling and Yuba Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 184 and 217, and between mile markers 221 and 222. US Route 50 between mile markers 130 and 141. US Route 89 between mile markers 239 and 280. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
